BR.name: Dillon's Rolling Western™ The Last Ranger
BR.description: O tatu patrulheiro Dillon está de volta, e desta vez ele trouxe a cavalaria. Junte-se a Dillon em novas missões para proteger cada vilarejo. Durante o dia, junte recursos, fortifique cada vilarejo e equipe as torres de armas. Recrute novos aliados ao derrotá-los em batalhas, ao decorrer do jogo. À noite, os ferozes Grocks saem de dentro da terra. Só você, o seu empregado armado e as torres de armas, controladas por habitantes locais, podem evitar a destruição do vilarejo e a dizimação dos animais de criação. Além de proteger o vilarejo das ondas de inimigos, agora, Dillon também precisa proteger um trem que passa a cada fase principal do jogo. Prepare-se!

CA.name: Dillon's Rolling Western™ The Last Ranger
CA.description: Armadillo ranger Dillon is back, and this time he’s brought the cavalry. Join Dillon on new missions to protect each town. Gather supplies, fortify each town, and equip gun towers during the day. Recruit new allies by battling and defeating them throughout the game. As night falls, voracious grocks rise up from the underground. The only things standing between the decimation of the town and livestock are you, your hired gun, and the gun towers manned by locals. In addition to keeping villages safe from the waves of approaching enemies, Dillon must now also protect a train that moves throughout each of the game’s main stages. Get ready to roll!

MX.name: Dillon's Rolling Western™ The Last Ranger
MX.description: El armadillo justiciero Dillon está de vuelta y esta vez trae refuerzos. Únete a Dillon en nuevas misiones para proteger a los pueblos. Durante el día, reúne suministros, fortifica los pueblos y equipa las torres de artillería. Derrota a tus rivales a lo largo del juego para convertirlos en aliados. Cuando se haga de noche, voraces monstruos saldrán de su guarida y deberás proteger el pueblo y su ganado con la ayuda de tus aliados y las torres de artillería operadas por la gente del pueblo. Además de salvar a los pueblos de las oleadas de monstruos, Dillon debe proteger un tren que se desplaza por cada uno de los niveles principales del juego. ¡A las armas!

US.description: Armadillo ranger Dillon is back, and this time he’s brought the cavalry. Join Dillon on new missions to protect each town. Gather supplies, fortify each town, and equip gun towers during the day. Recruit new allies by battling and defeating them throughout the game. As night falls, voracious grocks rise up from the underground. The only things standing between the decimation of the town and livestock are you, your hired gun, and the gun towers manned by locals. In addition to keeping villages safe from the waves of approaching enemies, Dillon must now also protect a train that moves throughout each of the game’s main stages. Get ready to roll!
